description:
Round 2 of the regular meet at Asagaoka reaches its climax! This time it`s Shiki`s turn at the buzzer, and he`s determined to keep winning until he gets his revenge match against Mikuriya. He`s been paired with Sonohara Akira, a Sekigawata Middle School third-year. But in contrast to his cute appearance, Akira is quite a tricky player, throwing Shiki off his stride and bringing an atmosphere of unrest to the meet...
Source: crunchyroll
